title: Dinnerbone:关于官方API的一些暗示
author: a20001017
txt_content:
Dinnerbone:Now back to work on 1.8 stuffs :)
Matt:The Maybe Half-Done Mod API Update! :D
Dinnerbone:Well if you'd prefer half done...


Dinnerbone:现在回来继续弄1.8的玩意 :)
Matt:也许会有的半成品官方API更新！ :D
Dinnerbone:如果你喜欢半成品的话那就……


不做评价，省的有人说我误导= =

replies.author: DPhil
replies.txt_content: 是不是有了官方API之后，各大mod的更新都能快很多？

replies.author: 额无语T
replies.txt_content:
猥琐的小强 发表于 2013-11-28 11:39 
1.8.....不会这么快吧
越来越接近2.0了

replies.author: jianghr
replies.txt_content: 官方API要出，这Forge半天不出是要闹情绪的节奏？

replies.author: 719_Lokii
replies.txt_content:
jianghr 发表于 2013-11-28 14:07 
官方API要出，这Forge半天不出是要闹情绪的节奏？
forge会抓狂的

replies.author: huanghongxun
replies.txt_content:
godoway 发表于 2013-11-28 15:24 
1.9.x之后会是1.10.x 然后1.11.x 这样
不是之前贴吧有2.0 Beta么。
官方出的光影的那个

replies.txt_content:
huanghongxun 发表于 2013-11-28 17:43 
不是之前贴吧有2.0 Beta么。

2.0是愚人節更新吧 那已經過了一段時間

replies.txt_content:
moonshell 发表于 2013-11-28 18:09 
2.0是愚人節更新吧 那已經過了一段時間

replies.author: Franz
replies.txt_content:
huanghongxun 发表于 2013-11-28 17:43

replies.author: ywt1993
replies.txt_content:
我觉得forge和bukkit在忙这个
This is due to Minecraft's change of how items are named (No longer are they assigned by ID, but only by name)
= =

replies.author: huanghongxun
replies.txt_content:
Franz 发表于 2013-11-28 19:28 
你火星已久～正式版 测试版傻傻分不清楚
但是从字样上看
以前的是Minecraft Beta 1.XXX
现在的是Minecraft 2.0 Beta
Beta在后面和在前面意义不一样吧。

replies.author: Franz
replies.txt_content:
huanghongxun 发表于 2013-11-29 12:39 
但是从字样上看
以前的是Minecraft Beta 1.XXX
现在的是Minecraft 2.0 Beta
为了防止混淆现在不用beta标识了       只有Pre-release预览       Snapshot快照

replies.author: 西瓜太郎
replies.txt_content: 表示API是什么都不知道T_T加油

replies.author: Neubulaeko
replies.txt_content:
Emerson 发表于 2013-11-27 23:01 
那就...
那就发一个半成品吧，假如别人骂我就说是你干的好事XD
